name: Allium Typography
description:
The Allium Design System is available in a collection of libraries. They provide the visual representation of our coded components and include colour, text, and effect styles. Use the complete set of Allium Figma design files to design TELUS digital experiences by duplicating these files and publishing them to your Figma:

  1. Allium Logos
  2. Allium Colours
  3. Allium Typography
  4. Allium Sizes
  5. Allium Icons
  6. Allium Components



Available features:

  • Variants allow you to select available responsive variants, states, and options.
  • Auto Layout is available on most components. Some don't have auto layout as they depend on the design or implementation to work properly.



Learn more about the Allium Design System from TELUS.

Let's make the future friendly.
